meanings.definition: A cardinal number representing a quantity of one quintillion.
meanings.sent1: There are quintillions of stars in the sky.
meanings.sent2: The scientist estimated the distance in quintillions of miles.
meanings.sent3: I have a quintillion reasons to smile today.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was worth a quintillion diamonds.
meanings.sent5: The treasure chest was filled with quintillions of gold coins.

meanings.definition: An extremely large number equal to 10^18.
meanings.sent1: The company's revenue reached quintillions last year.
meanings.sent2: The national debt is in the quintillions.
meanings.sent3: I would need a quintillion hours to finish this task.
meanings.sent4: The crowd cheered with a quintillion voices.
meanings.sent5: The universe contains quintillions of galaxies.
